Reason: The _journalSerializer configuration option is performance-sensitive. The configuration directly affects the serialization and deserialization process of journal entries in Prevayler, which are time-expensive operations. The journalSerializer() method provides flexibility in choosing the Serializer implementation, allowing for potential performance impacts based on the efficiency of the chosen Serializer. The choice of an efficient serializer can significantly improve system performance, while a less efficient one can lead to slower processing times at the system level.
